Updates should be made to reflect customer policy/procedures and when any changes to widget settings are made]: # **A.08.2** - Privileged access is required to be restricted and managed. Monitor this widget for anomalous users and behavior. **A.08.9** - Monitor this widget for users that should not have access to network control systems or network configuration files and investigate unfamiliar users. **A.05.15** - Shared Accounts should only be used when necessary on an exception basis. This widget should be monitored for anomalous levels of shared account activity. **A.07.2** - Physical Access to to sensitive areas within the in-scope environment are to be monitored. **A.05.15** - System and Service Accounts should be limited to least privilege. This widget should be monitored for activity that is anomalous for the related system and service accounts privileges. **A.08.2** - The use of privileged access is required to be captured and maintained. This widget should be monitored for anomalous levels of elevated privileges. **A.08.3** - Third-Party Activity in ISO 27001 environments should be monitored for unexpected activity.
